data.text: @ninatangri @celliottability Offering your thanks to policy enforcers that killed Ontario citizens is questionable. Find your integrity. https://t.co/0weLU4tHdb

@ninatangri @celliottability You might be able to live with your revisionist history but I would remind you that there are over 4300 dead from her SHODDY oversight of LTC homes. How’s that ‘Iron Ring’ going? Sure she’ll land some cushy BOD seat from protecting #MikeHarris
@ninatangri @celliottability It’s been a pleasure working with someone who causes hundreds of preventable deaths LTC facilities? Wow, you really don’t care about old people do you Nina! Shame on you.
